Flow.description: Updated to run in system context to fix access issues popping up for certain profiles.

formulas.name: BICaseSubject
formulas.expression: "Marketing List Request - Preferred Completion Date: " + TEXT({!Target_Completion_Date})

formulas.name: PriorityDefault
formulas.expression: IF({!Priority} = "Normal (SLA - 10 Business Days)", (TODAY() + 10), IF({!Priority} = "Critical/Urgent (SLA - Same Business Day)", TODAY(), IF({!Priority} = "High (SLA - 3 Business Days)", (TODAY() + 3), (TODAY() + 15))))

formulas.name: RequestDescripton
formulas.expression: "Requestor: " + {!Requestor} + BR() + "Department: " + {!Department} + BR() + "Today's Date: " + TEXT({!Today_s_Date}) + BR() + "Priority: " + {!Priority} + BR() + "Request Type: " + IF({!Marketing_Request_Type} = "Other", {!Please_Specify}, {!Marketing_Request_Type}) + BR() + "Preferred Completion Date: " + TEXT({!Target_Completion_Date}) + BR() +BR()+ "Title of Project: " + {!Title_of_Project_File_Name} + BR() + "New Project or Revision: " + {!Is_This_a_New_Project_or_a_Revision_Update_of_an_Existing_Asset} + BR() + "Requires Additional Collateral: " +{!Will_the_Content_in_this_Project_Require_Any_Existing_Collateral_to_be_Updated}+ BR()+ IF({!Will_the_Content_in_this_Project_Require_Any_Existing_Collateral_to_be_Updated}= "Yes", {!If_Yes_Please_Provide_Link_s_or_Upload_the_Collateral_Content_that_will_Require}, NULL) +BR()+BR()+ "Target Audience: " + {!Who_is_the_Target_Audience} + BR() + "Anyone to Exclude: " + {!Are_There_Any_Specific_Audiences_that_should_be_Excluded_as_Recipients} +BR()+ IF({!Are_There_Any_Specific_Audiences_that_should_be_Excluded_as_Recipients}= "Yes", "Please Exclude: ", NULL) +IF({!Principal1} = TRUE, "Principal", Null) +" " +IF({!Sallus1} = TRUE, "Sallus", NULL) +" "+ IF({!JP_Morgan1}=TRUE, "JP Morgan", NULL)+" " + IF({!Schwab1}=TRUE, "Schwab", NULL)+" " + IF({!RewardJet1}=TRUE, "RewardJet", NULL)+" " + IF({!Other1}=TRUE, {!Please_Specify_Audience_to_Exclude}, NULL)+BR()+BR()+ "Co-Branding with Partner(s)?: " + {!Does_this_Project_Need_Co_Branding_with_a_Partner}+BR()+ IF({!Does_this_Project_Need_Co_Branding_with_a_Partner}= "Yes", "Co-Brand With:", Null)+" "+IF({!Principal2} = TRUE, "Principal/Simply Retirement", Null) +" " +IF({!Sallus2} = TRUE, "Sallus", NULL) +" "+ IF({!Sallus_NFP2}=TRUE, "Sallus/NFP", NULL)+" " + IF({!Prospective_Partner_s2}=TRUE || {!Other2}=TRUE, {!If_Prospective_Partner_s_or_Other_Please_Specify}, NULL)+BR()+BR()+ "Goal/Desired Outcome: " + {!What_is_the_Goal_Desired_Outcome_of_this_Project}+BR()+ "Most Important Key Points/Ideas to Convey: " + {!sBriefly_What_are_the_Most_Important_Key_Point_s_or_Idea_s_You_Want_to_Convey}+BR()+ "Does the Recipient of this Material Need to Perform a Task that Requires Instruction?: " + {!Are_You_Asking_the_Recipient_of_this_Material_to_Perform_a_Task_that_Requires_In}+ " "+IF({!Are_You_Asking_the_Recipient_of_this_Material_to_Perform_a_Task_that_Requires_In}= "Yes", {!Please_Provide_a_SharePoint_Document_Link_Containing_Instructions_and_any_Releva}, NULL)+ BR()+BR()+ "What Phone, Email, and URL(s) Should be Used in the Project?: " + {!What_Phone_Email_and_URL_s_Should_be_Used_in_the_Project}+BR()+ "Do You Know Which Box Folder You Want this Document Saved In?: " + {!Do_You_Know_Which_Folder_You_Want_this_Document_Saved_in_Box}+ " "+ IF({!Do_You_Know_Which_Folder_You_Want_this_Document_Saved_in_Box}= "Yes", {!Please_Enter_Box_Folder_URL}, Null)+BR()+BR()+ "Notes: " +{!Notes}

Flow.label: Case | Tab | Marketing Request

fields.name: What_is_the_Goal_Desired_Outcome_of_this_Project
fields.fieldText: What is the Goal/Desired Outcome of this Project
fields.helpText: What is the objective or what are we trying to accomplish? E.g., share information, educate, alert about deadline, reminder to take action, etc.

fields.name: sBriefly_What_are_the_Most_Important_Key_Point_s_or_Idea_s_You_Want_to_Convey
fields.fieldText: Briefly, What are the Most Important Key Point(s) or Idea(s) You Want to Convey?
fields.helpText: E.g., why auto-enrollment should be included in your plan, you'll save more over 30 years because of flat fees, fill out this form so you don't get in trouble with the IRS, etc.

fields.name: Are_You_Asking_the_Recipient_of_this_Material_to_Perform_a_Task_that_Requires_In
fields.fieldText: Are You Asking the Recipient of this Material to Perform a Task that Requires Instructions?
fields.helpText: E.g. instructions to request a distribution, how to submit payroll, etc.

fields.name: Please_Provide_a_SharePoint_Document_Link_Containing_Instructions_and_any_Releva
fields.fieldText: Please Provide a SharePoint Document Link Containing Instructions and any Relevant Screenshots:

fields.name: What_Phone_Email_and_URL_s_Should_be_Used_in_the_Project
fields.fieldText: What Phone, Email, and URL(s) Should be Used in the Project?
fields.helpText: If necessary, add the URL(s) and/or contact information displayed for the receipient, e.g., your team's contact information, login webpage, hyperlink to additional piece of collateral, etc. If you don't know, enter TBD.

fields.name: Do_You_Know_Which_Folder_You_Want_this_Document_Saved_in_Box
fields.fieldText: Do You Know Which Folder You Want this Document Saved in Box?
fields.helpText: E.g., UB1 - Sales Collateral, UB2 - Client + Saver Success, etc.

fields.name: Notes
fields.helpText: Any additional context, requirements, or directions for your request.

fields.name: Confirmation
fields.fieldText: Thank you, your request has been created. Please press the "Done" button to exit this screen.

value.stringValue: If there are any files you'd like to include, upload them here.

fields.name: RequestDetailScreen
fields.fieldText: Request Details

fields.name: Title_of_Project_File_Name
fields.helpText: Enter the title of project or document/file name, etc. Marketing may rename and will provide alternate title for review.

fields.name: Is_This_a_New_Project_or_a_Revision_Update_of_an_Existing_Asset
fields.fieldText: Is This a New Project or a Revision/Update of an Existing Asset?

fields.name: Will_the_Content_in_this_Project_Require_Any_Existing_Collateral_to_be_Updated
fields.fieldText: Will the Content in this Project Require Any Existing Collateral to be Updated?

fields.name: If_Yes_Please_Provide_Link_s_or_Upload_the_Collateral_Content_that_will_Require
fields.fieldText: If Yes, Please Provide Link(s) for Collateral/Content that will Require Updates:

fields.name: Who_is_the_Target_Audience
fields.helpText: E.g., all eligible but not enrolled Savers who do not have a termination date, small business owners in California, financial advisors who have a plan in Implementations, etc.

fields.name: Are_There_Any_Specific_Audiences_that_should_be_Excluded_as_Recipients
fields.fieldText: Are There Any Specific Audiences that should be Excluded as Recipients
fields.helpText: E.g. Ubiquity partners, clients with advisors should not receive emails advertising investment advisory services, terminated employees with a balance , etc.

fields.name: Does_this_Project_Need_Co_Branding_with_a_Partner
fields.fieldText: Does this Project Need Co-Branding with a Partner?
fields.helpText: If this is being created for a partner, do we need to add their logo in addition to Ubiquity's?

fields.name: If_Prospective_Partner_s_or_Other_Please_Specify
fields.fieldText: If Prospective Partner(s) or Other, Please Specify:
